description:
Allows you to put in what you own keeps you up to date on its current value from some sources it has. Cleanly categorizes your purchases so if you have or buy various quantities and fineness from different sources, it will keep up with that as well.

With the background of the app being what it is, I was hoping to get a graph too, but, it is what it is.

Recommendations:
1) Add the graph
2) Allow us to put in what we paid for the metals so we can see growth or loss.
3) Add a graph purchase/vs value

With those three, I'd give it a 5.

You can view the current state of non traditional assets. I.e. 50 bars of silver or 1.3 Bitcoin and then get the latest value.

Great idea to do less calculating.

The app ran right out the gate on installing. If you're having issue try to run an app from the terminal to see error output.
